title: Bilingual Sentiment Analyzer
description: Large-scale Englishâ€“Arabic sentiment classifier trained on over 500,000 text samples using TF-IDF vectorization with Logistic Regression and Multinomial Naive Bayes. Includes preprocessing, evaluation metrics, and a Streamlit-based demo for real-time sentiment prediction.
highlights: TF-IDF + Logistic Regression / Naive Bayes pipeline
High accuracy & F1-score with fast Streamlit inference

title: Energy Load Forecasting Dashboard
description: Real-time energy demand forecasting dashboard using U.S. EIA API data. Implements Random Forest model with lag and rolling features, automated weekly retraining, and live visualization via Streamlit and Flask integration.
highlights: Random Forest baseline with engineered time-series features
Automated weekly retraining via Windows Scheduler
Streamlit visualization + Flask backend for live EIA data

title: GenAI + RAG PDF Buddy
description: LLM-powered document analysis assistant using Gemini API and RAG architecture. Processes lab reports, diagnostic summaries, and prescriptions via PDF upload, generating cited and context-aware answers using embeddings and vector search.
highlights: Embeddings + cosine similarity with FAISS/Chroma vector DB
Supports lab, diagnostic, and prescription document formats
